languages.text: "Я леди Моллес-Секандас, Ваше Сиятельство! Не далее как восемь циклов назад в мой дом вломился человек, выдающий себя за моего мужа, покойного лорда Моллеса. Он утверждает, что не был убит пиратами, как мне было известно ранее, а выжил якобы провидением Бога-Императора. Однако о его смерти имеется справка из Администратума, где точно указано, что мой муж преставился. Я требую казнить этого проходимца!" {n}Женщина воинственно размахивает свитком, на котором отчетливо видна надпись "признан мертвым".{/n}
languages.translation_comment: Кадр на правую сторону весов. После куя помощник кладет на чашу свиток.
Кадр на правую сторону весов. После куя помощник кладет на чашу свиток.

languages.text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I am Lady Molles-Secundas! Only eight cycles ago, a man broke into my house posing as my husband, the late Lord Molles. Contrary to what I know, he denies that he was killed by pirates. Instead, he purportedly survived, thanks to the God-Emperor's providence. However, I hold here his death certificate, issued by the Administratum, which clearly states that my husband passed away. I demand that this fraud be executed!" {n}The woman belligerently waves around a scroll on which the words "declared dead" are clearly visible.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я леди Моллес-Секандас, Ваше Сиятельство! Не далее как восемь циклов назад в мой дом вломился человек, выдающий себя за моего мужа, покойного лорда Моллеса. Он утверждает, что не был убит пиратами, как мне было известно ранее, а выжил якобы провидением Бога-Императора. Однако о его смерти имеется справка из Администратума, где точно указано, что мой муж преставился. Я требую казнить этого проходимца!" {n}Женщина воинственно размахивает свитком, на котором отчетливо видна надпись "признан мертвым".{/n}

Contrary to what I knew, he denies having been killed by pirates. Instead, he supposedly survived thanks to the God-Emperor's providence. However, I have his death certificate issued by the Administratum, which clearly states that my husband passed away. I demand that this fraud be executed!" {n}The woman belligerently waves a scroll on which the words "declared dead" are clearly visible.{/n}

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich bin Lady Molles-Secundas! Vor nunmehr acht Zyklen brach ein Mann in mein Haus ein, der sich als mein Ehemann, der verstorbene Lord Molles, ausgab. Entgegen meiner Kenntnisse leugnet er, von Piraten getötet worden zu sein. Angeblich hat er dank der Vorsehung des Gottimperators überlebt. Allerdings liegt mir sein vom Administratum ausgestellter Totenschein vor, aus dem klar hervorgeht, dass mein Ehemann verstorben ist. Ich fordere daher die Hinrichtung dieses Hochstaplers!" {n}Die Frau wedelt streitlustig mit einer Schriftrolle, auf der die Worte 'Für tot erklärt' deutlich zu erkennen sind.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I am Lady Molles-Secundas! Only eight cycles ago, a man broke into my house posing as my husband, the late Lord Molles. Contrary to what I know, he denies that he was killed by pirates. Instead, he purportedly survived, thanks to the God-Emperor's providence. However, I hold here his death certificate, issued by the Administratum, which clearly states that my husband passed away. I demand that this fraud be executed!" {n}The woman belligerently waves around a scroll on which the words "declared dead" are clearly visible.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Eire {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich bin Lady Molles-Secundas! Vor nunmehr acht Zyklen brach ein Mann in mein Haus ein, der sich als mein Ehemann, der verstorbene Lord Molles, ausgab. Entgegen meiner Kenntnisse leugnet er, von Piraten getötet worden zu sein. Angeblich hat er dank der Vorsehung des Gottimperators überlebt. Allerdings liegt mir sein vom Administratum ausgestellter Totenschein vor, aus dem klar hervorgeht, dass mein Ehemann verstorben ist. Ich fordere daher die Hinrichtung dieses Hochstaplers!" {n}Die Frau wedelt streitlustig mit einer Schriftrolle, auf der die Worte 'Für tot erklärt' deutlich zu erkennen sind.{/n}

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, je suis dame Molles-Secundas ! Il y a seulement huit cycles, un homme s'est introduit dans ma demeure en se faisant passer pour mon époux, feu le seigneur Molles. Contrairement à ce que je sais, il nie avoir été tué par des pirates et prétend avoir survécu grâce à la providence de l'Empereur-Dieu. Cependant, j'ai ici son certificat de décès, délivré par l'Administratum, qui stipule clairement que mon époux est mort. J'exige donc que cet imposteur soit exécuté ! » {n}s'exclame-t-elle en agitant agressivement un parchemin sur lequel on peut lire les mots « déclaré mort ».{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I am Lady Molles-Secundas! Only eight cycles ago, a man broke into my house posing as my husband, the late Lord Molles. Contrary to what I know, he denies that he was killed by pirates. Instead, he purportedly survived, thanks to the God-Emperor's providence. However, I hold here his death certificate, issued by the Administratum, which clearly states that my husband passed away. I demand that this fraud be executed!" {n}The woman belligerently waves around a scroll on which the words "declared dead" are clearly visible.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, je suis dame Molles-Secundas ! Il y a seulement huit cycles, un homme s'est introduit dans ma demeure en se faisant passer pour mon époux, feu le seigneur Molles. Contrairement à ce que je sais, il nie avoir été tué par des pirates et prétend avoir survécu grâce à la providence de l'Empereur-Dieu. Cependant, j'ai ici son certificat de décès, délivré par l'Administratum, qui stipule clairement que mon époux est mort. J'exige donc que cet imposteur soit exécuté ! » {n}s'exclame-t-elle en agitant agressivement un parchemin sur lequel on peut lire les mots « déclaré mort ».{/n}

languages.text: “大人，我是莫莱斯-塞孔达斯夫人！八个周期之前，有个人闯进了我的家里，冒充我的丈夫，也就是已故的莫莱斯勋爵。我的丈夫明明被海盗杀害了，但他却说他没死，而是在神皇的保佑下幸免于难。不过，我这里有帝国内政部亲笔签发的死亡证明，上面清清楚楚地写着我的丈夫已经去世。我要求处决这个骗子！”{n}眼前的女人气势汹汹地挥着手里的羊皮纸，上面清楚地写着“宣告死亡”的字样。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I am Lady Molles-Secundas! Only eight cycles ago, a man broke into my house posing as my husband, the late Lord Molles. Contrary to what I know, he denies that he was killed by pirates. Instead, he purportedly survived, thanks to the God-Emperor's providence. However, I hold here his death certificate, issued by the Administratum, which clearly states that my husband passed away. I demand that this fraud be executed!" {n}The woman belligerently waves around a scroll on which the words "declared dead" are clearly visible.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “大人，我是莫莱斯-塞孔达斯夫人！八个周期之前，有个人闯进了我的家里，冒充我的丈夫，也就是已故的莫莱斯勋爵。我的丈夫明明被海盗杀害了，但他却说他没死，而是在神皇的保佑下幸免于难。不过，我这里有帝国内政部亲笔签发的死亡证明，上面清清楚楚地写着我的丈夫已经去世。我要求处决这个骗子！”{n}眼前的女人气势汹汹地挥着手里的羊皮纸，上面清楚地写着“宣告死亡”的字样。{/n}

languages.text: «¡Mi{mf|lord|lady}, soy lady Molles-Secundas! Hace solo ocho ciclos, un hombre irrumpió en mi casa, haciéndose pasar por mi esposo, el difunto lord Molles. Al contrario de lo que sé, niega que lo mataran los piratas. En vez de eso, afirma que sobrevivió gracias a la ayuda del Dios Emperador. Sin embargo, tengo aquí su certificado de defunción, emitido por el Administratum, según el cual mi marido murió. ¡Exijo que ejecuten a este farsante!». {n}La mujer agita vigorosamente un pergamino en el que lees claramente las palabras «declarado muerto».{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I am Lady Molles-Secundas! Only eight cycles ago, a man broke into my house posing as my husband, the late Lord Molles. Contrary to what I know, he denies that he was killed by pirates. Instead, he purportedly survived, thanks to the God-Emperor's providence. However, I hold here his death certificate, issued by the Administratum, which clearly states that my husband passed away. I demand that this fraud be executed!" {n}The woman belligerently waves around a scroll on which the words "declared dead" are clearly visible.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Mi{mf|lord|lady}, soy lady Molles-Secundas! Hace solo ocho ciclos, un hombre irrumpió en mi casa, haciéndose pasar por mi esposo, el difunto lord Molles. Al contrario de lo que sé, niega que lo mataran los piratas. En vez de eso, afirma que sobrevivió gracias a la ayuda del Dios Emperador. Sin embargo, tengo aquí su certificado de defunción, emitido por el Administratum, según el cual mi marido murió. ¡Exijo que ejecuten a este farsante!». {n}La mujer agita vigorosamente un pergamino en el que lees claramente las palabras «declarado muerto».{/n}

languages.text: 「閣下、私がレディ・モレス・セクンダスです！わずか8周期前、私の夫、亡きモレス公を装って男が家に押し入ったのです。私の知っていることに反して、彼は夫が海賊に殺されたことを否定します。それどころか、神帝陛下の導きのおかげで生き延びたと称しています。しかし、私がここに持っている夫の死亡証明書は、帝国行政局が発行したもので、私の夫が亡くなったことがはっきりと書かれています。私は、この偽者の処刑を要求します！」{n}女性は好戦的に、「死亡宣告」の文字がはっきりと見える巻物を振り回す。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I am Lady Molles-Secundas! Only eight cycles ago, a man broke into my house posing as my husband, the late Lord Molles. Contrary to what I know, he denies that he was killed by pirates. Instead, he purportedly survived, thanks to the God-Emperor's providence. However, I hold here his death certificate, issued by the Administratum, which clearly states that my husband passed away. I demand that this fraud be executed!" {n}The woman belligerently waves around a scroll on which the words "declared dead" are clearly visible.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「閣下、私がレディ・モレス・セクンダスです！わずか8周期前、私の夫、亡きモレス公を装って男が家に押し入ったのです。私の知っていることに反して、彼は夫が海賊に殺されたことを否定します。それどころか、神帝陛下の導きのおかげで生き延びたと称しています。しかし、私がここに持っている夫の死亡証明書は、帝国行政局が発行したもので、私の夫が亡くなったことがはっきりと書かれています。私は、この偽者の処刑を要求します！」{n}女性は好戦的に、「死亡宣告」の文字がはっきりと見える巻物を振り回す。{/n}

languages.text: "{mf|Lordum|Leydim}, bendeniz Leydi Molles-Secundas! Yalnızca sekiz döngü önce merhum kocam Lord Molles'i taklit eden bir adam, evime zorla girdi. Bildiklerimin aksine korsanlar tarafından öldürüldüğünü inkâr ediyor. Sözde Tanrı İmparator'un inayetiyle hayatta kaldığını dile getiriyor. Lakin elimde Administratum tarafından düzenlenmiş ve kocamın vefat ettiğini açıkça belirten bir ölüm belgesi var. Bu sahtekârın idam edilmesini talep ediyorum!" {n}Kadın, üzerinde "ölü ilan edilmiştir" kelimelerinin açıkça görülebildiği bir tomarı hışımla sallıyor.{/n}

However, I hold here his death certificate, issued by the Administratum, which clearly states that my husband passed away. Bildiklerimin aksine, korsanlar tarafından öldürüldüğünü inkâr ediyor. Aksine sözde Tanrı İmparator'un inayetiyle hayatta kaldığını dile getiriyor. Lakin elimde Administratum tarafından düzenlenmiş ve kocamın vefat ettiğini açıkça belirten bir ölüm belgesi var.
